author: Predeactor
description: A free cog for talking to Cleverbot!
install_msg: Hello! Thank for adding my Cleverbot cog! Please note that this cog is in beta and may contain bugs or undesired behavior. If so, **PLEASE** open an issue on my repo (https://github.com/Predeactor/Predeactor-Cogs) and say what's wrong.
